actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Beak and one Shortsword or two Shortbows.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 5 (1d4+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 6 (1d6+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit 80/320' one target 6 (1d6+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tempest Breath (Recharges: Short/Long Rest)
actions.desc: Exhales lungful of air in 15 ft. cone. Each creature in that area pushed up to 15 ft. away from gullkin (DC 12 Str negates).

bonus_actions.name: Mark Quarry (Recharges: Short/Long Rest)
bonus_actions.desc: Marks a creature as its quarry. Whenever hunter hits marked creature with weapon attack deals extra 1d6 damage to target.

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: The gullkin can hold its breath for 5 min.
